title: KDE Plasma 5.27.11 LTS Fixes Flatpak Support in Discover, Plasma Wayland
description:
KDE Plasma 5.27.11 is now available as a bugfix update to the KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS desktop environment series to address more issues, crashes, and bugs.

The post KDE Plasma 5.27.11 LTS Fixes Flatpak Support in Discover, Plasma Wayland appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
